name: CloudToLocalLLM_Project
observations: Flutter-based application for managing local LLM instances
Has Node.js backend services (api-backend and streaming-proxy)
Uses Docker for deployment and containerization

name: CloudToLocalLLM_Auth0_App
observations: Supports authorization_code, implicit, refresh_token, client_credentials grants
